item.description:
UPDATE: We only had a few people that were really interested in dinner. To accommodate all we will meet before AND after the show at the Orleans. We re running this event with the Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club - several people will have "Wedeln" logo wear on - just say hello. People can order apps or entrees but we will not have a big group meal. Instead just come by when you can and introduce yourself. I will have a blue and yellow jacket with a large "Wedeln ski & Outdoors Club" logo on the back.

New schedule looks like this:

5:30pm Early arrivals at Orleans
6:30pm Somerville Theatre - We will sit in the center of balcony
9:30pm When movie lets out we will be back at Orleans for a larger celebration

http://www.orleansres....

We have some area reserved at Orleans starting at 9:30pm, I assume the bar will be crowded but probably at least half will be part of our group. For the pre-movie arrivals we will look for a spot at the bar.

As of today (11/3) there are still tickets available but you must purchase soon. this will sell out.

--------------

Warren Miller movies are the gold standard for all ski/snowboard movies. Every Fall for 50 years the Warren Miller team has toured the country to show off its latest creation. It is not just a movie, its an event. This year the movie is titled "Dynasty" and the preview looks awesome.

$19 may seem like a lot for a movie BUT you get several 2 for 1 lift tickets and other give-aways. You will make back your admission price - most years i go twice just to get the deals :).

The movie starts at 7pm but we will meet at a bar for drinks and snacks before the show and go over as a group. If people want to meet early we can get dinner. We can also have a few post-movie beers as well. This will be a great way to meet members of this meet up and make some connections before the snow starts falling. The Somerville Theatre is in the middle of Davis Sq, about a 50 ft walk from the RedLine station.

Buy your tickets on your own as soon as possible, it will sell out - Somerville Theatre

For more info on the movie and giveaways check out - http://www.skinet.com....
item.how_to_find_us: I will let you know the bar when we get closer to the date.
item.name: Warren Miller Movie in Somerville
